Docs.summary: Represents a control that is displayed for a policy on the farm-wide Configure Information Management Policy page in Central Administration.

Docs.param: The key identifier for the control.
The collection of all incoming name values.
Docs.summary: Processes postback data for an ASP.NET server control.
Docs.returns: true if the server control's state changes as a result of the post back; otherwise, false.

remarks.para: The ASP.NET page infrastructuretracks all the server controls that return true to this method call, and then invokes the method on those controls.

Docs.summary: Signals the server control to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.
